input: Sentence 1: Manuel sat on his front porch and let out a sigh. Sentence 2: He had been waiting for twenty minutes already. Sentence 3: Soon, a white vehicle pulled up to his house. input: Sentence 1: On July 4th, 2016 Alan and Fran will be married for 13years. Sentence 2: They did not have anything planned to celebrate the day.
